item.title: First Meeting Discussion Notes
item.description: Thumbnail sketch for each of the readings. Connections and contradictions between all of them. Thinking as a whole with the set.1 Petraglia Reconceiving Writing genre oriented Research oriented Field - at that moment Many What is writing - composition teach value Joyce Walker - CHAT approach Practice and study skills to practices Practices tend to be located in community Community of practice Work on Prior knowledge - how people learn
